--- title: Tabular learner keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "The function to immediately get a `Learner` ready to train for tabular data" --- 
from nbdev.showdoc import *

Main functions¶

class TabularLearner[source]

TabularLearner(dbunch, model, loss_func=None, opt_func='Adam', lr=0.001, splitter='trainable_params', cbs=None, cb_funcs=None, metrics=None, path=None, model_dir='models', wd_bn_bias=False, train_bn=True) :: Learner

Learner for tabular data

tabular_learner[source]

tabular_learner(dbunch, layers=None, emb_szs=None, config=None, loss_func=None, opt_func='Adam', lr=0.001, splitter='trainable_params', cbs=None, cb_funcs=None, metrics=None, path=None, model_dir='models', wd_bn_bias=False, train_bn=True)

Get a Learner using data, with metrics, including a TabularModel created using the remaining params.

Integration example with training¶

from fastai2.callback.all import *

path = untar_data(URLs.ADULT_SAMPLE)
df = pd.read_csv(path/'adult.csv')

cat_names = ['workclass', 'education', 'marital-status', 'occupation', 'relationship', 'race']
cont_names = ['age', 'fnlwgt', 'education-num']
procs = [Categorify, FillMissing, Normalize]
splits = RandomSplitter()(range_of(df))

to = TabularPandas(df, procs, cat_names, cont_names, y_names="salary", splits=splits)

dbunch = to.databunch(bs=64)
dbunch.show_batch()
workclass education marital-status occupation relationship race age_na fnlwgt_na education-num_na age fnlwgt education-num salary
0 Self-emp-not-inc 11th Never-married Craft-repair Not-in-family White False False False 28.000000 211031.999430 7.0 <50k

4 Private 11th Married-civ-spouse Machine-op-inspct Husband White False False False 27.000000 161682.998483 7.0 <50k
5 ? Prof-school Married-civ-spouse ? Husband White False False False 62.999999 257876.002517 15.0 <50k
6 Private Bachelors Never-married Prof-specialty Own-child White False False False 23.000000 238092.000304 13.0 <50k
7 Self-emp-not-inc Some-college Widowed Craft-repair Not-in-family Black False False False 52.000000 40200.003203 10.0 <50k
8 Private 12th Married-civ-spouse Machine-op-inspct Husband White False False False 49.000000 105444.002171 8.0 <50k
9 Self-emp-not-inc Masters Married-civ-spouse Exec-managerial Husband White False False False 35.000000 202026.999929 14.0 >=50k 
learn = tabular_learner(dbunch, [200,100], metrics=accuracy)

learn.fit_one_cycle(1)
